title: A lightning look at O'Reilly's Python books
description:
Wouldn't it be awesome if ChiPy wrote its own book? We'd be able to get
BEvERages for weeks, maybe months on the royalty! If so, we'd need to
see what's already out there.

This lightning talk takes a look at O'Reilly's Python books using
requests and BeautifulSoup, with a little of scipy's hierarchical
clustering on the book descriptions. It is presented in an iPython
notebook.
